topics.body:
Another Digimon thing.
[spoiler]Does anyone else feel like Gatomon's face turn was a bit too _quick_? After serving under Myotismon for all those years and then Wizardmon just says some pretty words and *poof* intant good guy. It's a bit contrived if you ask me.[/spoiler]

i think my favourite part of digimon season 2, is that the villains plan at one point to stop the digidestined, is to make an oc digimon, which is literally made up of parts of other digimon
like it's actually amazing in retrospect
